attributes.action: Call for deselection of MP’s subverting brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
Take this chance to instruct the political powers to rid the UK of the very people who are currently plotting to overthrow the biggest vote and the biggest decision this country has taken in our time.

Stand up for the United Kingdom, it’s democracy and it’s independence.
attributes.background:
It has become clear, a number of MP’s have been actively working to subvert the 2016 referendum result.

I call upon all political parties and independents to self deselect their subversive MP’s by order of the people of the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
